languages.text: "Он тут давно, дольше чем ты или любой из вас. Его священная стопа попрала палубы этого судна сотни лет назад, еще когда предшественник Теодоры звал себя Лорд-капитаном. Он прибыл со звезд, где обитает Многорукий Император, неся Его слова, но стал жертвой ужасающего кровопролития, устроенного нечестивцами".

"He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."
languages.original_text: "Он тут давно, дольше чем ты или любой из вас. Его священная стопа попрала палубы этого судна сотни лет назад, еще когда предшественник Теодоры звал себя Лорд-капитаном. Он прибыл со звезд, где обитает Многорукий Император, неся Его слова, но стал жертвой ужасающего кровопролития, устроенного нечестивцами".

traits.locale_text: "He's been here a long time, longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed the decks of this ship hundreds of years ago, back when Theodora's predecessor called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Emperor-in-the-Void dwells to bear His word, but fell at the hands of the wicked."
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: «Lleva mucho tiempo aquí. Más que tú y que nadie. Sus benditos pies ya recorrían estas cubiertas hace siglos, cuando el predecesor de Theodora aún se hacía llamar Lord Capitán. Vino de más allá de las estrellas, donde vive el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos, para traer su palabra, pero después se enfrentó a una gran masacre a manos de los malvados».
languages.original_text: "He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: «Lleva mucho tiempo aquí. Más que tú y que nadie. Sus benditos pies ya recorrían estas cubiertas hace siglos, cuando el predecesor de Theodora aún se hacía llamar Lord Capitán. Vino de más allá de las estrellas, donde vive el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos, para traer su palabra, pero después se enfrentó a una gran masacre a manos de los malvados».
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: 「彼は、ずっとここにいます…あなたを含め誰よりもずっと前から。何世紀も前、シオドーラの前任者がまだロード・キャプテンと名乗っていた頃、彼の祝福された足がこのデッキの床を踏んだのです。彼は多腕の皇帝の言葉を伝えるために、皇帝の住む星からやってきました。しかし、しばらくして、邪悪な者による大虐殺に直面しました」
languages.original_text: "He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は、ずっとここにいます…あなたを含め誰よりもずっと前から。何世紀も前、シオドーラの前任者がまだロード・キャプテンと名乗っていた頃、彼の祝福された足がこのデッキの床を踏んだのです。彼は多腕の皇帝の言葉を伝えるために、皇帝の住む星からやってきました。しかし、しばらくして、邪悪な者による大虐殺に直面しました」
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: “他已经在这艘船上待了很久很久，比你和其他人都要更久。几百年前，当西奥多拉的前任行商浪人在位时，他受到祝福的双脚就踏上了这片甲板。他来自四臂神皇居住的群星，传播祂的福音，但最终却死在了恶人手中。”
languages.original_text: "He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: “他已经在这艘船上待了很久很久，比你和其他人都要更久。几百年前，当西奥多拉的前任行商浪人在位时，他受到祝福的双脚就踏上了这片甲板。他来自四臂神皇居住的群星，传播祂的福音，但最终却死在了恶人手中。”
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Er ist schon lange hier. Länger als Ihr oder irgendjemand sonst. Seine gesegneten Füße haben diese Decks vor Jahrhunderten überquert, als Theodoras Vorgänger noch Lord Captain war. Er kam aus den Sternen, wo der vielarmige Imperator lebt, um dessen Botschaft zu verbreiten, doch dann wurde er mit einem gewaltigen Massaker konfrontiert, verübt durch die Hände der Bösen."
languages.original_text: "He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist schon lange hier. Länger als Ihr oder irgendjemand sonst. Seine gesegneten Füße haben diese Decks vor Jahrhunderten überquert, als Theodoras Vorgänger noch Lord Captain war. Er kam aus den Sternen, wo der vielarmige Imperator lebt, um dessen Botschaft zu verbreiten, doch dann wurde er mit einem gewaltigen Massaker konfrontiert, verübt durch die Hände der Bösen."
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: « Voilà bien longtemps qu'il est là. Plus longtemps même que n'importe qui d'autre. Ses pieds bénis foulaient déjà ces passerelles il y a des siècles, quand le prédécesseur de dame Théodora se faisait encore appeler seigneur-capitaine. Il est venu des étoiles où réside l'Empereur aux mille bras pour répandre sa parole, mais à l'époque, les impies ont eu raison de lui. »
languages.original_text: "He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien longtemps qu'il est là. Plus longtemps même que n'importe qui d'autre. Ses pieds bénis foulaient déjà ces passerelles il y a des siècles, quand le prédécesseur de dame Théodora se faisait encore appeler seigneur-capitaine. Il est venu des étoiles où réside l'Empereur aux mille bras pour répandre sa parole, mais à l'époque, les impies ont eu raison de lui. »
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Uzun zamandır buradaydı. Senden de başkalarından da daha uzun zamandır. Kutsal ayakları bu güverteleri yüzyıllar önce, daha Lord Kaptan sıfatını Theodora'nın atası kullanırken adımladı. Çok Kollu İmparator'un ikamet ettiği yıldızlardan, O'nun sözlerini yaymak için geldi ancak kötülüklerin elinde büyük bir katliamla karşı karşıya kaldı."
languages.original_text: "He has been here a long time — longer than you or anyone else. His blessed feet crossed these decks centuries ago, when Theodora's predecessor still called himself Lord Captain. He came from the stars where the Many-Armed Emperor dwells to bear His word, but then he faced a great massacre at the hands of the wicked."
